# Angular SSR Homes App - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is an Angular 16 application with Server-Side Rendering (SSR) enabled. It's a homes listing application with routing and dynamic details pages.

## Project Structure
- **Components**: HomeComponent, DetailsComponent, HousingLocationComponent
- **Services**: HousingService for data management
- **Interfaces**: HousingLocation TypeScript interface
- **Routes**: Home page and details page with dynamic id parameter

## Development Guidelines
- Use Angular 16 with SSR/Universal
- Follow Angular best practices for SSR compatibility
- Ensure all HTTP calls are compatible with server-side execution
